title: War Cry
lyrics:
Our people are dying slowly every day
The enemy's trying, attacking every way he can
We gotta fight, we gotta fight, we gotta fight
You see in this generation materialistics
Swallow the minds of these innocent children, yeah
We gotta fight, we gotta fight, we gotta fight

Oh you see the fame and the drugs

The money, the lust, the violence, the hatred

And we must bleed the blood of Jesus

We gotta fight, we gotta fight, we gotta fight



Oh, and I say, "Devil you can't have my mind"

(Devil you can't have my mind)

"Devil you can't have my soul"

(Devil you can't have my soul)

I belong to god and I'm fighting you off

With the power of the Holy Ghost

I say, "Devil you can't have my mind" (Ooh, no)

"Devil you can't have my soul"

I belong to god and I’m fighting you off

With the power of the Holy Ghost



This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)



We got some pastors false preaching

These church folks are leaving

'Cause they're so confused about these wrongfully teachings

Making a bad name for all of us Christians

So many saints are holding unforgiveness

We got nation against nation

Earthquakes in various places

People living in famine

Everyone's losing patience

This is a war cry that everyone needs to hear

I can feel in the air that the end is near



Say, "Devil you can't have my mind"

"Devil you can't have my soul"

I belong to god and I'm fighting you off

With the power of the Holy Ghost

I say, "Devil you can’t have my mind" (No)

"Devil you can't have my soul"

I belong to god and I'm fighting you off

With the power of the Holy Ghost



This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (War cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (War cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)



This is a spiritual warfare, a spiritual

This is a spiritual warfare, a spiritual

This is a spiritual warfare, a spiritual, a spiritual, a spiritual

This is a spiritual warfare, a spiritual

This is a spiritual warfare, a spiritual

This is a spiritual warfare, a spiritual, a spiritual, a spiritual

Our souls are crying out to you Jesus

Our souls are crying out to you Jesus

Our souls are crying out

Our souls are crying out

Tell us what not to do, Jesus

My soul is crying out to you, Jesus

My soul is crying out

My soul is crying out



This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry (This is a war cry)

This is a war cry, a war cry, a war cry (This is a war cry)

War cry, a war cry, a war cry (This is a war cry)

(Devil, you can't have my mind, no)

A war cry, war cry, war cry

(Devil, you can't have my soul)

A war cry, war cry, war cry

War cry, war cry, war cry (War cry)

Power of the Holy Ghost

(Devil, you can't have my mind)

This is a war cry, a war cry, this is my war cry
